about_the_game:
Hyperons

Hyperons takes you on a captivating SciFi survival adventure. Immerse yourself in a fascinating world full of challenges and dangers, where you must fight for survival.
After a devastating crash on an alien world, you are tasked with gathering resources, building your base, and defending against hostile threats while awaiting rescue. The universe, populated by pirates, rebels, and various alien races, will put your skills to the test.
Harness the groundbreaking Hyperons technology to explore new worlds and delve deeper into the mystery of Hyperons. Along your journey, you'll have the opportunity to enhance your body with cybernetic modifications to strengthen your survival instincts.
Make difficult decisions that shape the course of the story and interact with different factions and races to forge alliances or ignite conflicts. Engage in heart-pounding space combat, embark on risky missions, and explore fascinating space stations.
Are you ready to venture into the dangerous depths of the universe and survive in an unknown world? Bring all your abilities, survival instincts, and tactical skills to master and survive in Hyperons.

Features:
- A captivating SciFi survival adventure
- Resource gathering, base building, and defense against hostile threats
- Interaction with pirates, rebels, and alien races
- Utilize Hyperons technology to explore new worlds
- Body customization through cybernetic modifications
- Make decisions that influence the course of the story
- Intense space combat and risky missions
- Explore fascinating space stations and interact with different factions

Prepare yourself for an epic SciFi survival adventure in Hyperons and survive the challenges that await you!
